author: Fextralife
description:
Bellwright Gameplay Preview - SHOULD You PLAY It? Is It Worth it? 
In this video, we're going to be taking a look at Bellwright, which is a medieval survival RPG, kind of like a city builder elements as well. That is a new update that's coming today, right at the time of this video release. So in this video, we're going to be talking about the story and setting, like the plot of the game and why you're doing what you're doing. The gameplay mechanics and combat of the game. The crafting of it, the tech trees available to research in Bellwright. So you know what to build and craft. And also the new content that's free for anyone who owns the game. 

Get the game here: https://connect.playbellwright.com/fextralife_longform
Sponsored by: Snail Games
